issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

AdGuard Social Media

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List Other extensions used: | cookie auto delete

comment.body:
It seems that YouTube's anti-adblock has changed. For the UI, a 5-second timer before closing has been added. I also tried referring to the link you provided, but the problem persists.
-----Original Message-----
From: ***@***.***>
To: ***@***.***>;
Cc: "Dong Heon ***@***.***>; ***@***.***>;
Sent: 2023-10-17 (화) 21:48:57 (GMT+09:00)
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] www.youtube.com (Issue #162262)

#162262 (comment)
@hui1601 그래도 안되시면, 아래 URL를 참고해보세요.
https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/KnownIssues/youtube-anti-adblock
—
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or unsubscribe.
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.***>

While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.2.168 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List Other extensions used: | cookie auto delete

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.androidpolice.com/google-pixel-8-battery-diagnostics/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.androidpolice.com%2Fgoogle-pixel-8-battery-diagnostics%2F) ### Comment > Can't load comments on Android Police articles. > > Issue might be with Web Annoyances filter. I was able to turn it on and off to create the Comments not appearing. > > Been an issue for a couple years since they resigned their website. Unsure if uBlock origin still has the issue but I may have the same filter(s). Can't use desktop right now Username: @vondubenshire ### Screenshots
